solution_line_template: She buys {num_curtains} pair of curtains for ${curtain_price} each so that's {num_curtains}*{curtain_price} = $<<{num_curtains}*{curtain_price}={curtains_total}>>{curtains_total}
She buys {num_prints} wall prints at ${print_price} each so that's {num_prints}*{print_price} = $<<{num_prints}*{print_price}={prints_total}>>{prints_total}

The curtains cost ${curtains_total}, the prints are ${prints_total} and the installation service is ${installation_fee} for a total of {curtains_total}+{prints_total}+{installation_fee} = $<<{curtains_total}+{prints_total}+{installation_fee}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
